name: Alkemia Customs Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct Alkemia Customs ship hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs.

name: Civilian Grade Nanoforge
desc:
A powerful and versatile manufacturing "black box", capable of building itself out to a small factory, given the necessary raw materials and human assistance.

This one is very limited in what it can produce. Nonetheless, having access to a nanoforge at all is a step up as far as starship construction goes.
